R

reinforce - Variable in class map.State
The reinforce flag.
run() - Method in class EventHandlers.StageController.StageControllerThread
This is the method that calls the four stages for each country in a round robin fashion.
run() - Method in class stages.MilitaryTheatresStage.BattleThread
This method runs a single battle for the state that was specified during the construction of this class.
runMilitaryTheatresStage(Country) - Static method in class stages.MilitaryTheatresStage
This method runs the the military theatres stage for the specified country.
runProductionStage(Country) - Static method in class stages.ProductionStage
This method updates the population, soldiers, and tanks for every state belonging to country.
runStrategicIntelligenceStage(Country) - Static method in class stages.StrategicIntelligenceStage
This method gathers the intelligence necessary for the other stages to run properly.
runStrategicMovementsStage(Country) - Static method in class stages.StrategicMovementsStage
This method moves military units from safe states to states that have a reinforce flag.
